prompts.title: H1 Heading
prompts.guide: Use as the main page headline. There should only be one H1 per page. Place it at the very top of your page content.
prompts.text: Write a single H1 heading for a location page about @target_keyword in @city, @state. Include the keyword and city naturally. Keep it under 70 characters.

prompts.title: Hero Paragraph
prompts.guide: Place directly below the H1 heading as the opening text visitors see first.
prompts.text: Write a short 2-3 sentence opening paragraph for a location page about @target_keyword in @city, @state. Immediately establish what the business does and where it operates. Weave in the keyword naturally within the first two sentences. Keep the tone professional and confident.

prompts.title: Local Area Section Heading
prompts.guide: Use as an H2 heading to introduce the local area section.
prompts.text: Write a short H2 heading for a section about the @city, @state area and how it relates to @target_keyword. Make it natural and locally relevant, not generic.

prompts.title: Local Area Content
prompts.guide: Place directly below the Local Area heading. This section builds local relevance for SEO.
prompts.text: Write a 150-200 word paragraph about @city, @state that establishes local relevance for a @target_keyword business. Reference well-known neighborhoods, landmarks, or characteristics of the area. Explain why residents in @city need or benefit from this service. Include @target_keyword once naturally. Do not make up specific statistics. Write naturally — this should read like it was written by someone who knows the area.

prompts.title: Services Section Heading
prompts.guide: Use as an H2 heading to introduce the services section.
prompts.text: Write a short H2 heading for a section describing @target_keyword offerings in @city, @state. Keep it keyword-rich but not stuffed.

prompts.title: Services Content
prompts.guide: Place directly below the Services heading. Describes what the business offers.
prompts.text: Write a 150-200 word paragraph describing the services related to @target_keyword available in @city, @state. Cover 3-4 specific sub-services or specializations that would be relevant. Tailor the sub-services to what makes sense for @target_keyword. Include the keyword once naturally. Write with authority.

prompts.title: Why Choose Us Heading
prompts.guide: Use as an H2 heading to introduce the trust/credibility section.
prompts.text: Write a short H2 heading for a trust-building section about choosing a @target_keyword provider in @city, @state. Avoid the generic phrase "Why Choose Us" — make it more compelling.

prompts.title: Why Choose Us Content
prompts.guide: Place directly below the Why Choose Us heading. Builds trust and credibility.
prompts.text: Write a 120-150 word paragraph explaining why someone in @city, @state should choose a trusted local provider for @target_keyword. Focus on trust signals: experience, local knowledge, customer commitment, and reliability. Include the keyword once naturally. Do not fabricate specific numbers, awards, or certifications.

prompts.title: FAQ Heading
prompts.guide: Use as an H2 heading to introduce the FAQ section.
prompts.text: Write a short H2 heading for a FAQ section about @target_keyword in @city, @state. Keep it simple and SEO-friendly.

prompts.title: FAQ Content
prompts.guide: Place directly below the FAQ heading. These target featured snippets in Google search results.
prompts.text: Write 4 frequently asked questions with answers about @target_keyword in @city, @state. Format each as: the question in bold followed by a 2-3 sentence answer. Questions should reflect what real customers would search for on Google. Include @target_keyword naturally in at least one question. Include the city name naturally in at least 2 of the answers. Do not use numbered lists. Make sure to use new line after every question and every answer.

prompts.title: CTA
prompts.guide: Place near the bottom of the page. Add a contact button or phone number next to this text.
prompts.text: Write 7 to 10 word short phrase/sentence call-to-action paragraph encouraging the reader to get in touch for @target_keyword in @city, @state. Create urgency without being pushy. End with a clear next step.

prompts.title: Service Areas Heading
prompts.guide: Place this as the H2 heading for the service areas section, typically near the bottom of the page above the footer.
prompts.text: Write a short H2 heading for a section about the areas near @city, @state where the business provides @service. Keep it locally relevant and natural.

prompts.title: Service Areas Content
prompts.guide: Place this below the Service Areas heading. This paragraph mentions nearby cities to show coverage area and boost local SEO relevance.
prompts.text: Write a brief 2-3 sentence paragraph mentioning 4-6 nearby cities or communities surrounding @city, @state where the business also provides services. Also for each of the nearby location, make sure to link it to a wikipedia link. Write it naturally, not as a list. Make it read like a helpful note about coverage area.
